alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:59PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT STOREY...DOUGLAS AND CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM PDT... At 459 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Churchill Station, or 19 miles southwest of Lahontan Reservoir, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Churchill Station, Stagecoach, Wabuska, Silver Springs, and Silver Springs Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
